title: Four-Storey Apartment Wastewater Drainage Pipe Layout
description: Executed the complete ground floor plumbing and wastewater drainage system for a 48-unit residential apartment in Joska. The scope included main water supply line positioning, drainage slope alignment, and foundational pipework installation to support upper-level extensions in the next project phase.

title: 5-Bedroom Villa Plumbing Maintenance and Repair Works
description: Comprehensive plumbing repair and maintenance works for a luxurious 5-bedroom villa in Lavington. Services included leak detection, water pressure correction, valve replacements, and optimization of hot and cold water supply lines to ensure long-term reliability and efficiency.

title: Solar Water Heater Maintenance and Servicing
description: Performed routine servicing and performance diagnostics on a rooftop solar water heating system. Tasks included descaling, leak inspection, pipe insulation checks, and re-pressurizing the system for optimal energy efficiency and hot water delivery throughout the household.

title: Concealed Cistern Replacement
description: Completed removal and replacement of a faulty concealed cistern unit at The Location Rooftop Lounge. Tasks included breaking tilework, replacing the in-wall cistern mechanism, waterproofing, tiling restoration, and full system testing for leak-free operation and modern functionality.
location: The Location Rooftop Lounge, Yaya, Nairobi
